title: Hit Miss Wear
summary: A Hit That You Can't Miss
description: This release is for smartwatches running Android Wear. To play Hit Miss on your phone or tablet please use this link: http://goo.gl/iP1y7qIn this game you control the blue ball with your taps. Hit the yellow ones with blue, bump a red to another red, make the purple one fall into the hole and hit the star fast to make it fly and get 5 points for each.Just tap anywhere on screen and Blue will move towards your finger. Tap further from Blue, get greater pull force. If Blue is already moving, the combined force of your tap and Blue's own movement determines its new speed and direction. Every tap diminishes your score by 1. Blue is the "only" one you can control with your taps.*The hole only allows the purple ball in. Others go right over.*When the star is flying it does not hit another ball.*Green cubes get bigger or taller from time to time, you can't get rid of them.Meet Games are designed to let you become familiar with the cast and the task. These games are for learning purposes or just for fun. Scores of the Meet Games won't affect your best or total.You can finish with negative scores. It's normal for starters.Like Us On Facebook: https://fb.me/jappettogames
descriptionHTML:
This release is for smartwatches running Android Wear. To play Hit Miss on your phone or tablet please use this link: http://goo.gl/iP1y7q

In this game you control the blue ball with your taps. Hit the yellow ones with blue, bump a red to another red, make the purple one fall into the hole and hit the star fast to make it fly and get 5 points for each.

Just tap anywhere on screen and Blue will move towards your finger. Tap further from Blue, get greater pull force. If Blue is already moving, the combined force of your tap and Blue's own movement determines its new speed and direction. Every tap diminishes your score by 1. Blue is the "only" one you can control with your taps.

*The hole only allows the purple ball in. Others go right over.

*When the star is flying it does not hit another ball.

*Green cubes get bigger or taller from time to time, you can't get rid of them.

Meet Games are designed to let you become familiar with the cast and the task. These games are for learning purposes or just for fun. Scores of the Meet Games won't affect your best or total.

You can finish with negative scores. It's normal for starters.

Like Us On Facebook: https://fb.me/jappettogames
comments: Ok!?....i think? To win this game you have to hit the blue circle into the red circle which then has to hit another red, in which case it turns into a purple then if you score through the goals followed by it striking another purple it then turns into a frozen turkey which when loaded into the frozen turkey cannon then can be shot into adolf hitlers anus. Then you win. Horrah!!
